thread.title: Video shows Charles Oakley surrounded on ground after reportedly punching 3 security guards
thread.title_full: Video shows Charles Oakley surrounded on ground after reportedly punching 3 security guards

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Video shows Charles Oakley surrounded on ground after reportedly punching 3 security guards
text:
Video shows Charles Oakley surrounded on ground after reportedly punching 3 security guards Oakley is being charged with assault. Post to Facebook Video shows Charles Oakley surrounded on ground after reportedly punching 3 security guards Oakley is being charged with assault.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/charles-oakley-video-knicks-security-guards-fight-james-dolan/   Video shows Charles Oakley surrounded on ground after reportedly punching 3 security guards Adi Joseph , USA TODAY Sports 10:29   
Knicks legend Charles Oakley wasn't just kicked out for yelling at owner James Dolan . He was surrounded, detained and arrested for reportedly punching three security guards. 
This phone video via SportsBlogNewYork shows the ugly scene at Madison Square Garden - though the language isn't all audible, some NSFW language can be made out: 
To be clear, the video shows no direct police brutality, nor does it show the reason for Oakley ending up on the ground. But that question may be answered via New York's ABC affiliate: 
The Knicks' response to the incident said Oakley was "completely abusive." 
The justice system now can work out the particulars, if the Knicks or any people involved decide to press charges. 
A #FreeOakley movement already has started. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/charles-oakley-video-knicks-security-guards-fight-james-dolan/ Most Popular
